about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: At Celikon Construction, we combine quality and trust
about.description: As Celikon Construction, we are a pioneer in the steel construction sector with years of experience. With our quality, reliability and customer satisfaction-oriented working principle, we have signed many successful projects. We are a reliable business partner in the sector with our certificates and references.
